doc.title: Sachai Ki Taqat
doc.plot: Havaldar Ram Singh has been a constable with Bombay Police for several years, and is known for his honesty and helpful nature. He has a run-in with a gangster, and finds out that this gangster is protected by very influential people. When he attempts to address this issue, his brother, Sagar, is arrested and imprisoned for a crime he claims he did not commit. Ram, however, is able to convince the judge of Sagar's innocence, and gets him released. Then Ram comes across the real prepetrator of the crime, and brings him over to the police station, and finds himself embroiled in deception, and charged with the murder of the person he had just brought in.
